title: How to Make Toasted Icing

steps.headline: Whip together the sugar, melted butter, and condensed milk.
Add the nuts and mix through.
Spread the mixture on top of the cake.
Place the iced cake under the griller on low.
steps.description: Gently and quickly toast until golden brown. Keep a close eye on it!

steps.headline: Remove from the griller and leave to set out of direct sunlight or a warm area.

text: Whip together the sugar, melted butter, and condensed milk.  Add the nuts and mix through.  Spread the mixture on top of the cake.  Place the iced cake under the griller on low. Gently and quickly toast until golden brown. Keep a close eye on it! Remove from the griller and leave to set out of direct sunlight or a warm area.
